title: High School Mathematics Learning Design Process Utilizing Pedagogical Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Proficiency in Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Designed to enable high school students to acquire college-level math concepts, optimized for LMS-based asynchronous learning environments. Focuses on systematic activity design rather than teacher-learner interaction

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematics learning activities using over 15 pedagogical patterns.
Learners can apply context-adaptive strategies when designing mathematics activities tailored to the cognitive level of target learners (high school students).
Learners cultivate dynamic improvement capabilities in learning designs through peer review processes conducted at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
